name: Book Catalog
description: This project is a full-stack Event Book Application where users can add book, search book with many criteria using redux. User can add book to wish =list and read later.

description: This project is a full-stack Event Booking Application where users can book events, both free and paid, using Stripe for payment processing.

name: PC Builder
description: Create a PC Builder app using Next.js with SSG for product/category detail pages and SSR for the PC Builder page.

name: Clock App
description: A visually stunning clock application with real-time transitions between day and night modes based on the current time. Features a user-friendly and dynamic interface built with React Native and Expo.
